borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <div>The siting, scale, design and appearance of the proposed development are considered harmful to the original dwelling, built form of the terrace. It would create an increased sense of enclosure to the street scene and the pitched roof would not sit comfortably next to the flat roof of the adjacent dwelling's existing side extension, which would result in not respecting the area's character, therefore contrary to the following plans and policies:</div><div><br></div><div><p><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">- National Planning Policy</span>&nbsp;Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023);<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt; line-height: 14.98px;">- Policy D4 of the London Plan (March 2021);<o:p></o:p></span></p><p><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">- Policy CP3 of the&nbsp;</span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);<o:p></o:p></p><p><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the&nbsp;</span>Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);</p><p class="MsoNormal"></p><p><span pt="" sans",="" sans-serif;"="" style="font-size: 10.5pt;">- Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of&nbsp;</span>The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021);</p><p>- The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s&nbsp;Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).</p></div>

The proposed development, by reason of scale, design and siting, would result in an overshadowing impact, and a harmful loss of sunlight/daylight to number 229 Westrow Drive, therefore constituting undue harm and contrary to:

- National Planning Policy Framework National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2023)

- Policies D4 & D8 of the London Plan (March 2021);

- Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010);

- Policies BP8 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011);

- Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021);

- The London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).
description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey rear extension and construction of a first floor side extension including changes to ground floor fenestration
